question: I love this girl? She says she loves me too. But she doesn't want to marry me. She says she has some problems. so i dont know what to do. Can you please guide me? thanks
answer:
QUESTION
I love her very much. She is very nice. She is religious and says she loves me. I did istekhara and I had good feelings about her. So i am not sure what to do now. She says she has some problems and she need to take care of them first. She is trying to become more religious. So if you can pls guide me through this the islamic way. On what to do? and how to go about it. I will greatly appreciate it. Should I wait for her? or Should I just forget I love her?
ANSWER


Share:
At the outset, we wish to point out that according to the Shari?ah, it is Haraam to have any unnecessary contact or communication with a Ghayr Mahram (not prohibited in marriage) female.

Since you had proposed marriage to the person and she has refused you, there is no point in considering her in marriage. You should move ahead with your life and consider marrying someone else.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
